title: Ranked Team (LF Gold +)
body:
Hi guys,

Looking to make a friendly team of 5-10 that we can leisurely play ranked 5s together. If the group gets big, we can constantly rotate and/or play games whenever a 5 is on.

Currently looking for all positions so just list what and where you wanna play.

Would be preferable if people were ongoing and friendly, and no raging regardless of what is happening.

replies.body:
Hello
Gold II
Main role : mid/top
IGN: Lawliet18
This is pretty much exactly what I'm looking for. I'll try to add you when I get back from Uni (Plant biology can only get so interesting). Gold II Top/ADC/Mid player.
I'm keen, I'll add you on league and we can chat.

Ign: damosstorm

Platinum 5 right now 

I want an active team.

I dont rage, and i stay positive 

I play frequently and am flexible with time
ign Wolves gold 3 able to play tonight
Hi, I'm a diamond V midlaner looking for a team at the moment. Want to play seriously but pretty friendly. Add me in game if you want, i play whole afternoon.
